divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside to have a smoke..... about half way through while facing north I looked straight up and there it was!! Three lights in a fixed triangle shape was directly over head!!! The lights were huge, much larger than an airplane and they were not blinking. There was a strange wavey kind of haze under the hole triangle...like heat rising from the pavement. It was moving north and faster than any plane I've ever seen...it was not a plane!!!!! Planes are not this large, this fast, and silent.or cover that much distance in such a short time. WOW was my reaction as my mouth droped open...this really is real... It flew out of sight heading north. As I finished my smoke wondering if I should share my sighting.... I was overcome with a feeling of calm...I saw what saw and will no longer wonder "if". Only wish I had caught it on tape.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around April 22nd 2009
